snippet: We need to set a better standard for humanitarian intervention.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Robert A Pape argues that a new standard for humanitarian intervention is needed, one modeled on the NATO intervention in Libya; laments that Syria would not qualify according to this standard, as there is no way for an international coalition to stop the mass-homicide campaign there without unacceptable loss of life.
lead_paragraph: We need to set a better standard for humanitarian intervention.
